vehicles.description: Parked white van on the right side of the ego car, partially obstructing the driving lane
vehicles.explanation: The van's position may force the ego car to merge left into the adjacent lane to safely pass.

vehicles.description: Several vehicles are parked on the right side of the road, potentially narrowing the driving space
vehicles.explanation: Ego car may need to reduce speed and drive cautiously to navigate through the tighter space.

vehicles.description: Oncoming traffic visible in the distance, headlights on, indicating low visibility conditions.
vehicles.explanation: The ego car should be prepared for reduced visibility and potential glare from oncoming vehicles.

vehicles.description: A black car parked on the right, before the white van, with its tail lights on.
vehicles.explanation: This car is parked but indicates that the area has vehicles parked on the side of the road, requiring the ego vehicle to be cautious of potential doors opening or pedestrians around these vehicles.

traffic lights.description: A traffic signal ahead displaying a red light in the distance, above the center of the roadway.
traffic lights.explanation: The ego vehicle must prepare to stop as required by the traffic signal unless it changes to green before the vehicle reaches the intersection.

general_perception.description and explanation: The image reveals several road users influencing driving behavior. There is a parked white van on the right side of the ego car, partially obstructing the driving lane, which may necessitate merging left into the adjacent lane to safely pass. Additionally, several vehicles are parked on the right side of the road, potentially narrowing the driving space and causing the ego car to reduce speed and drive cautiously. Oncoming traffic is visible in the distance with headlights on, indicating low visibility conditions, requiring the ego car to be prepared for reduced visibility and potential glare. A black car is parked on the right before the white van, with its tail lights on, signaling that the area has vehicles parked on the side of the road, mandating caution due to potential doors opening or pedestrians near these vehicles. Finally, a traffic signal ahead displays a red light above the center of the roadway, requiring the ego vehicle to prepare to stop unless the signal changes to green before reaching the intersection.

1.description and explanation: This is a parked car positioned parallel to the curb on the side of the road. The rear lights are illuminated, indicating that the car may be occupied or has only recently been parked. The ego car must maintain a safe distance while passing to avoid any potential hazards, such as the car door opening or the car pulling out into traffic.

driving_suggestion: Proceed with caution, reducing speed due to wet road conditions and potential loss of traction. Prepare to merge left safely to avoid the parked white van and navigate the narrowed driving space while monitoring for any oncoming traffic. Assess the traffic light as the vehicle approaches and be ready to stop if the light remains red. Use defensive driving tactics to ensure safety under these nighttime and weather conditions.
